content: beautiful lightweight summer shawl for cool nights the pattern is based on an art deco stained glass window i used 4 skeins of a silk/merino wool blend fingering-weight 50g = 200m yarn and a 3 5mm hook the pattern is broken into sections with any special stitches explained with photos the finished shawl will require blocking to bring out the lacy pattern available as both a written pattern and diagrams/charts **update 1 june 2018 ** the written pattern has been extensively revised corrected and improved upon comments on projects created before this date do not reflect the current pattern as it is written
